You're comments are awesome. They give all the necessary information, and than some. It's the little touches that really get to me, like "u liking touching kids", and "massive brain damage causing retardation."

MrGundIsMyBitch, Highfive.  I thought I was alone in this sea of idiots.  You said everything I would have said and even questioned these fools sexuality to the very end.  Good show.  And by sea of idiots I mean the world in general, not this thread or site or an actual body of water.  This torrent looks interesting and I originally clicked on it thinking it was Internet Protocol Man, some interwebs super hero.  It turns out that MrGundIsMyBitch is our true interwebs superhero.  I'll have to check this series out on IMDB and see what it's about rather than ask here like some douche bag.  I thank the uploader as you have exposed me to what seems like an interesting foreign film without having to brave any seedy rental shops in Little Asia.  High fives all around for the interwebs superheros of the pirate bay.

To RoweAlex and Onlythebest2011 and anyone else who might be confused, this is not the 3rd part to the movie nor is it even the 3rd part in a set. This movie is not related to the other 2 ipman movies starting Donny Yen. It is a completely different production all together made by different directors and producers entirely. The only relation is that it is also about Ip Man...
